THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: Title references 'The Science of Women’s Health' and '10 Truths You Need to Know,' while the thumbnail's text ('THEY'RE LYING TO YOU') suggests misinformation and the unveiling of hidden facts. THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any contrasts or mismatches between thum: The thumbnail emphasizes deception and urgency ('LYING'), which is more sensational than the relatively informative and scientific framing of the title.
